price: 6. Marka dadka la isu wada keenana ahaan cadowyadooda, oo ahaan  kuwo caabudiddooda dafira.
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ḥushira al-nāsu kānū lahum aʿdāan wakānū biʿibādatihim kāfirīna
